Verses: 1 naan Piradhaanamaai Sollugira Puththiyennavenil, Ellaa Manusharukkaagavum Vinnappangalaiyum Jebangalaiyum Venduthalgalaiyum Sthoththirangalaiyum Pannavendum;
2 naam Ellaap Bakthiyodum Nallozhukkaththodum Kalagamillaamal Amaidhalulla Jeevanampannumpadikku, Raajaakkalukkaagavum, Adhigaaramulla Yaavarukkaagavum Appadiye Seyyavendum.
3 nammudaiya Ratchagaraagiya Dhevanukkumunbaaga Adhu Nanmaiyum Piriyamumaayirukkiradhu.
4 ellaa Manusharum Ratchikkappadavum, Saththiyaththai Arigira Arivai Adaiyavum, Avar Siththamullavaraayirukkiraar.
5 dhevan Oruvare, Dhevanukkum Manusharukkum Maththiyastharum Oruvare.
6 ellaaraiyum Meetkum Porulaagath Thammai Oppukkoduththa Manushanaagiya Kiristhu Yesu Avare; Idharkuriyasaatchi Etra Kaalangalil Vilangivarugiradhu.

7 idharkaagave Naan Pirasangiyaagavum, Apposthalanaagavum, Purajaathigalukku Visuvaasaththaiyum Saththiyaththaiyum Vilangappannugira Podhaganaagavum Niyamikkappattirukkiren; Naan Poi Sollaamal Kiristhuvukkul Unmaiyai Sollugiren.
8 andriyum, Purushargal Kobamum Tharkkamumillaamal Parisuththamaana Kaigalai Uyarththi, Ellaa Idangalileyum Jebampannavendumendru Virumbugiren.
9 sthireegalum Mayiraip Pinnudhalinaalaavadhu, Ponninaalaavadhu, Muththukkalinaalaavadhu, Vilaiyerappetra Vasthiraththinaalaavadhu Thangalai Alangariyaamal,

10 thagudhiyaana Vasthiraththinaalum, Naanaththinaalum, Thelindha Buththiyinaalum, Dhevabakthiyullavargalendru Sollikkollugira Sthireegalukku Etrapadiye Narkiriyaigalinaalum, Thangalai Alangarikkavendum.
12 ubadhesampannavum, Purushanmel Adhigaaranjseluththavum, Sthireeyaanavalukku Naan Uththaravu Kodukkiradhillai; Aval Amaidhalaayirukkavendum.
13 ennaththinaalenil, Mudhalaavadhu Aadhaam Uruvaakkappattaan, Pinbu Evaal Uruvaakkappattaal.
14 melum, Aadhaam Vanjikkappadavillai, Sthireeyaanavale Vanjikkappattu Meerudhalukku Utpattaal.
15 appadiyirundhum, Thelindha Buththiyodu Visuvaasaththilum Anbilum Parisuththaththilum Nilaikondirundhaal, Pillaippetrinaale Ratchikkappaduvaal.
